pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ṭhitā nisinnassa dhammaṃ desenti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.3: “Na ṭhito nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.4: Na ṭhitena nisinnassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.5: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca ṭhito nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
